1201820.name: Vital Signs: ED - Infections Package
1201820.description:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added patients by completing the Infections Cases scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a random shift.

New patients included with this Infections Package:

  • 12yo M with abdominal pain and fever

  • 8yo F acute lymphocytic leukemia with Fever, Altered Mental Status

  • 42yo F with right arm pain

  • 3yo M with right-sided limp

  • 22yo F with right lower quadrant pain

  • 19mo M with Febrile Seizure

  • 9yo F acute lymphocytic leukemia with Fever

  • 46yo F with weakness in legs

  • 3yo M with right-sided limp
1201820.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
